title: Parker MLB - Astros are Getting Off Easy; Embrace the 60-Game Sprint; Tigers Short Season Preview
itunes:title: Parker MLB - Astros are Getting Off Easy; Embrace the 60-Game Sprint; Tigers Short Season Preview
description:
This week on Inside the (Rob) Parker, Rob thinks the University of Cincinnati made the right call by taking ex-Reds owner Marge Schott's name off of their athletic facilities, why the Astros are getting off easy, and why he's happy with a condensed 60-game season. Former major leaguer and Dodgers pre-game host Jerry Hairston Jr., discusses his expectations for the condensed season. Detroit beat writer Chris McCoskey previews the Tigers for the shortened season. Click here to subscribe and download all of the latest Inside the Parker podcasts!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
